title: Pixel 5 Google Pay : Phone doesn't vibrate in Silent Mode when doing a Payment (previous phone did)
content:
As Title.
I come from a Huawei P30 and even in silent mode, my phone was vibrating when making a google pay NFC payment.

Impossible to get my Pixel 5 to vibrate the same way in silent mode...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
